alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:58PM EDT until July 07 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WAKULLA AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of St. Marks, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Newport, Cody, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Thomas City, Plum Orchard, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Fanlew, Wacissa, Spring Creek, Wacissa Springs and Liveoak Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
